mapper.select: SELECT board.board_no boardNo, board.writer as writer, board.title as title, to_char(board.board_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') as boardDate, content content, board_img0 boardImg0, board_img1 boardImg1, board_img2 boardImg2, board_img3 boardImg3, board_img4 boardImg4, board_img5 boardImg5, board_img6 boardImg6, board_img7 boardImg7, board_img8 boardImg8, board_img9 boardImg9 FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum,board_no,writer,title,board_Date,content,board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3,board_img4,board_img5,board_img6,board_img7,board_img8,board_img9 FROM (SELECT board_no,writer,title,board_Date,content,board_img0,board_img1,board_img2,board_img3,board_img4,board_img5,board_img6,board_img7,board_img8,board_img9 from board where board_state='userBenefit' and location='P' order by board_no+0 desc)) board
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO=${boardNo} AND board_state='userBenefit' and location='P'
